title: Our children's Occupational Therapists (OT's), pictured, are celebrating OT Week by sharing how proud...

attachments.displayName:
Our children's Occupational Therapists (OT's), pictured, are celebrating OT Week by sharing how proud they are to do their job #proud2bOT

Why do you love being an OT?

Seeing the kids' smiles when they first move themselves in their wheelchairs.

Helping children achieve goals they didn't think they could & the sense of achievement when they do.

Seeing the beaming smiles of the kids when they learn to ride their bikes.

object.content:

actor.displayName: East Kent Hospitals University NHS Foundation Trust
